ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 14.4 (13.9-14.8) mg/l 24 hr, wt 184 mg, flow-through bioassay, dissolved oxygen 7.4 (4.6-8.8) mg/l, water hardness 44.9 (42.4-46.6) mg/l as CaCO3, pH 6.9-7.7, alkalinity 42.9 (39.6-61.4) mg/l CaCO3, temp: 26.4 +/- 1.4 °C, Purity 99%
